lines.text: Well, there's always the chance that Prince Charming may come riding down off the mountain someday.
How do you feel?
Any luck, Señor Mitchell?
Yes, all of it bad.
Perhaps you would like a drink, off the house?
If the emeralds are as big as the mosquitos, we're in great shape.
Blonde or brunette?
Tell me, do you look for the mountain first, then the girl? Or the girl, then the mountain? I just thought I'd ask. You know they always seem to go together, like the chicken and the egg.
She's a blonde vision of loveliness. Yeah. She'll be waiting on the dock, just where I left her. Makes all the others look like lampshades.
There are only two places in the world you can find emeralds, Colombia and Siberia. One of those is a closed corporation.
Hi there. You're late.
I'm sorry, I was trying to arrange for a red carpet and a brass band.
Look, what kind of a doctor do you call yourself? You haven't even inquired about my side.
Well, I assumed you'd be bright enough to stay off bumpy roads. Forgive me, how is your side?
Well, I think it's going to need a lot of attention.
You two seem to be getting along.
Splendidly.
You didn't tell me how charming your partner was.
I never noticed.
Greed is stronger than fear.

[Following her first kiss with Rian]
I take it, you must be the expert on the romantic movement in South America.
Donald tells me you're going to Bogata.
Only for two weeks.
To see anybody in particular?
Of course, a coffee broker. Age seventy-three.
Seventy-three? A wonderful time of life.
Now, don't tell me you were jealous?
Homocidally.
Oh Cathy, stop thinking like a woman! You're fighting a losing battle down there. Why try and hang on there when the rainbow's up here?
love and feeling and pride. Things you wouldn't know about. Things you can't buy with your emeralds!
Cathy, you cannot do this thing.
I'm sorry, Father, but, this is one fight I can't win by turning the other cheek.
If you destroy the mountain, you will be destroying yourself, as well.
